metadata.description: Enter name to assign to the Azure VM running SQL Server. The name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and '-', but can't start or end with '-' or have more than 13 characters.
Administrator user name for logging into the virtual machine and SQL Server.

The password must be between 16 and 128 characters in length and must contain at least one number, one non-alphanumeric character, and one upper or lower case letter. Default value is Password.1234567890

properties.description: Allow inbound traffic inside the subnet
Allow outbound traffic inside the subnet
